title: My PBE account might have been deactivated
body: I have been unable to access my pc and when I just got It repaired I tried to login to my PBE account to see my old info wasn't working, not sure if it got reset or if it just deactivated permanently, it would be helpful if I could get a response on what occurred and maybe even how I should go about retrieving the account.

replies.body: Sometimes really old PBE accounts that haven't been used in an extended amount of time might be disabled from inactivity. No worries though, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) from your main account and after verifying yourself we should be able to reactivate that PBE for ya.
Thank you so much for the reply, I deeply appreciate it.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 


P.S. I just noticed your pokemon reference in your name. S+
